values.title: Community First
values.description: Support and strengthen mom-and-pop pharmacy stores for healthier communities.

values.title: Patient Empowerment
values.description: Make access simple. Give people the power to choose their pharmacy with respect, privacy, reliability in every interaction.

values.title: Partnership and Transparency
values.description: Co-design solutions with partner pharmacies to build trust and shared success.

readyToExperience.title: Ready to experience the convenience of Optimus Heath Solutions
readyToExperience.description: Join thousands of satisfied patients who trust us with their prescription delivery needs.

banner.title: "How It Works" - Simple, Secure and Local
banner.description: We handle the coordination so you can focus on your health, while your trusted local pharmacy takes care of the rest

howItWorks.headline: Prescription Delivery

steps.title: Request Delivery
steps.description: Our team will contact your pharmacy to refill your prescriptionsSimply use our platform to request delivery in minutes. Select pharmacy location, your delivery address, day and time of delivery. You can create an account for easy process or checkout as guest

steps.title: Get it Delivered
steps.description: Relax! Once the pharmacy receives and confirms fulfilment for pickup. We will deliver your prescription to your home, workplace, or any location of your choice quickly (in minutes), securely, and conveniently

howItWorks.message: Whether you're refilling, transferring, or scheduling care, Optimus HS connects you directly with your trusted local pharmacy to make it fast, reliable, and stress-free

descriptionOfProcess.title: Refill Prescription
descriptionOfProcess.description: When you need a refill? Simply submit your refill request through our platform. We'll connect with your selected local pharmacy to process it quickly. Once filled, you'll get an instant update to track or schedule your delivery right to your doorstep.

descriptionOfProcess.title: Transfer Prescription
descriptionOfProcess.description: It only takes a minute to transfer your prescription from your old pharmacy to your preferred local one. We'll securely send your details to the new pharmacy and confirm the transfer within a day. Once it's ready, you'll be notified to schedule your delivery wherever and whenever you need it.

descriptionOfProcess.title: Schedule Essential Healthcare Services
descriptionOfProcess.description: Easily schedule vaccinations, health screenings, or wellness consultations at your preferred local pharmacy. We'll coordinate your appointment details and confirm your slot instantly. It's convenient, community-based care -handled securely and at no extra cost to you.

benefit.title: See all our Benefits
benefits: Zero cost to deliver Rx when using our partner pharmacies

footer.slogan: Connecting communities to their local pharmacies for fast, reliable access to prescriptions
footer.footerText: Optimus Health Solutions. All rights reserved.
